mapper.select: SELECT u.email , u.user_name , u.birthday , u.gender , u.password , u.profile_image_url , auth.auth , u.couple_status , u.created_at , c.user1_email , c.user2_email , c.couple_name , c.COUPLE_PROFILE_IMAGE FROM users u JOIN user_auth auth ON u.email = auth.user_email LEFT JOIN couples c ON (u.email = c.user1_email OR u.email = c.user2_email) WHERE u.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, user_name, birthday, gender, password, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{userName}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{password}, sysdate)
insert into user_auth(auth_no, user_email, auth) values (user_auth_seq.nextval, #{userEmail}, #{auth})
